item.title: Review: Hands-On Domain-Driven Design with .NET Core by Alexey Zimarev
item.description: I have updated this post because the author took the time to respond to my review. TL;DR The book Hands-On Domain-Driven-Design with .NET Core by Alexey Zimarev illustrates the pros & cons of different CQRS/ES persistency options in the .
